name.baseName: 麦草畏 ; 2,3-二氯苯胺、二甲苯 ; 合成 ; 所有规模 ; 全国第二次污染普查数据

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Waste wateris/，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management0，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = annual power consumption of equipment (kWh) / (equipment operating power (kW) × annual production operating time (hours))

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Waste wateris/，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management0，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = annual power consumption of equipment (kWh) / (equipment operating power (kW) × annual production operating time (hours))
technology.technologicalApplicability: 所描述的工业过程是Dicamba的合成，该过程采用了管道尾端管理技术来处理生产过程中产生的废水。Dicamba是一种除草剂，可用于农业中控制阔叶杂草。它适用于所有生产规模，并且对于制定作物保护产品至关重要。这些数据特别适用于专注于杂草管理解决方案的除草剂和农业化学品制造商。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 第二次全国污染源普查产排污核算系数手册（试用版）,二级代码26,三级代码263.0文件，在完整版文件中第2936页

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This dataset is derived from the Pollution Source Census Report and contains information on pollution emissions and related products. However, it does not include data on energy or chemical consumption, nor does it provide information on waste or co-product generation. When utilizing this dataset, please supplement the missing data based on actual conditions before use
该数据集来源于污染源普查报告，包含污染物排放及相关产品信息，但不包含能源或化学品消耗数据，也不提供废弃物或共生产物产生信息。在使用该数据集时，请根据实际情况补充缺失数据后再使用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

common:referenceToPersonOrEntityGenerati.common:shortDescription: The data was created by the Office of the Second National Pollution Source Census of the Ministry of Ecology and Environment, and the data was organized by the TianGong Plan team for ILCD format
生态环境部第二次全国污染源普查工作办公室创建数据，天工计划团队常慧敏整理数据为ILCD格式

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: 源文件中描述为为麦草畏，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为工业废水量

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Waste wateris/，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management0，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = annual power consumption of equipment (kWh) / (equipment operating power (kW) × annual production operating time (hours))
污染物指标工业废水量的末端治理技术是/，其效率为0。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为工业废水量，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为工业废水量
